SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.rules

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.rules.Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
CaseRule, ContradictionRule, DirectRule, MergeRule
public abstract class Rule extends Object
Abstract base class for defining rules. This class encapsulates the common functionality and attributes of all rules, including rule identification, description, image handling, and validation logic. Subclasses must provide implementations for specific rule checking logic.

  • Method Details

    • checkRule

      public abstract String checkRule(TreeTransition transition)
      Checks whether the transition logically follows from the parent node using this rule
      Parameters:
      transition - transition to check
      Returns:
      null if the child node logically follow from the parent node, otherwise error message

    • checkRuleRaw

      protected abstract String checkRuleRaw(TreeTransition transition)
      Checks whether the transition logically follows from the parent node using this rule. This method is the one that should overridden in child classes
      Parameters:
      transition - transition to check
      Returns:
      null if the child node logically follow from the parent node, otherwise error message

    • checkRuleAt

      public abstract String checkRuleAt(TreeTransition transition, PuzzleElement puzzleElement)
      Checks whether the child node logically follows from the parent node at the specific puzzleElement index using this rule
      Parameters:
      transition - transition to check
      puzzleElement - equivalent puzzleElement
      Returns:
      null if the child node logically follow from the parent node at the specified puzzleElement, otherwise error message
